title: The Adventures of Heidi Collins: Guiding Light of Justice

story.text: Heidi Collins discovers her ability to see people's true intent, a gift that helps her guide tourists not just through the historical city, but also through their own moral dilemmas.
She identifies a lost child in the crowd, seeing the fear overshadowing him, and adeptly guides him back to his grateful parents.
While leading a group near the river, Heidi senses a planned wrongdoing and subtly redirects her group to prevent a theft from occurring unnoticed.
Heidi is confronted by a mysterious figure who knows about her powers and warns her of upcoming challenges that will test her limits.

A troubling vision strikes Heidi during a tour; she sees a bridge collapsing with a school bus on it. Using her quick thinking, she manages to avert the crisis by convincing the driver to take another route.
Heidi's heroic deeds start attracting local media attention. She reluctantly steps into the limelight to promote community safety and awareness.
As the week concludes, Heidi feels more connected to her city and its inhabitants, ready to embrace her role as a guardian guided by the light of justice.

ending: As the sun sets on Sunday, Heidi Collins stands silhouetted against the city skyline, a beacon of hope and an emblem of the power of guidance.
moral: True heroes guide not just steps, but hearts as well.
